Package ohos.agp.components

Class InputAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.InputAttribute

  • public class InputAttribute
extends Object
    Provides the input attributes of a control.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORBID_EDITOR_ACTION
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that when the input method is in full screen, this operation cannot be used in any accessory button on the right side of the extracted text.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORBID_FULLSCREEN
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the input method cannot enter full screen mode.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORBID_PERSONALIZED
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that no data personalization is allowed for the input method.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORCE_LINEFEED
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the Enter button inserts a line break when multiple lines of text are involved.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_NEXT_FOCUSABLE
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the current component has a focusable next component.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_ONLY_ASCII
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the input method allows for ASCII characters.
      static int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_PREVIOUS_FOCUSABLE
      Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the current component has a focusable previous component.
      static int ENTER_KEY_NULL
      Indicates the generic unspecified type for input method option, which means that no Enter button type is specified.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_DONE
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "done" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_GO
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "go" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_MASK
      Indicates a bit mask of the operation to be performed after the user presses the Enter key.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_NEXT
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "next" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_NONE
      Indicates that no operation is performed.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_PREVIOUS
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "previous" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_SEARCH
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "search" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_SEND
      Indicates an enter key type that performs a "send" motion.
      static int ENTER_KEY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED
      Indicates a common type of input enter key motion that is not specified.
      int inputEnterKeyType
      Indicates the extended type of an editor for a better input method integration.
      int inputPattern
      Indicates the input type of a TextField.
      static int PATTERN_DATETIME
      Indicates keyboard type is the date and time pad.
      static int PATTERN_DATETIME_NORMAL_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_NUMBER is date and time.
      static int PATTERN_DATETIME_ONLY_DATE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_DATETIME is date.
      static int PATTERN_DATETIME_ONLY_TIME
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_DATETIME is time.
      static int PATTERN_FLAGS_MASK
      Indicates a bit mask for the keyboard type flags.
      static int PATTERN_MASK
      Indicates a bit mask for the text input type.
      static int PATTERN_NULL
      Indicates that no keyboard type is specified, and in this case, no keyboard is displayed by default.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER
      Indicates the keyboard type is the PIN pad.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER_DECIMAL_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_NUMBER is decimal numbers.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER_NORMAL_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_NUMBER is number.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER_PASSWORD_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_NUMBER is PIN.
      static int PATTERN_NUMBER_SIGNED_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_NUMBER is signed numbers.
      static int PATTERN_PASSWORD
      Indicates the keyboard type is the security keyboard.
      static int PATTERN_PHONE
      Indicates the keyboard type is the phone numbers pad.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT
      Indicates the keyboard type is the text keyboard.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_EMAIL_ADDRESS_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is email address.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_EMAIL_SUBJECT_TYPE
      Indicates the type of PATTERN_TEXT is email subject.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_FILTER_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is filter text.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_FULL_SCREEN_MULTIPLE_LINES_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_TEXT, which means that multiple lines of text are allowed when the keyboard is displayed in full screen.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_LONG_MESSAGE_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is long message.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_MULTIPLE_LINES_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_TEXT, which means that multiple lines of text are allowed.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_NORMAL_TYPE
      Indicates the default type of PATTERN_TEXT, which is text.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_PASSWORD_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is password.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_PERSONAL_NAME_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is personal name.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_POSTAL_ADDRESS_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is postal address.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_SHORT_MESSAGE_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is short message.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_TO_SPEECH_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is speech text.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_UPPERCASE_CHARACTERS_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_TEXT, which means that all characters are capitalized.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_UPPERCASE_SENTENCES_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_TEXT, which means that the first letter of each sentence is capitalized.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_UPPERCASE_WORDS_FLAG
      Indicates a flag of PATTERN_TEXT, which means that the first character of each word is capitalized.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_URI_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is URI.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_VISIBLE_PASSWORD_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is visible password.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_WEB_CONTENT_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is web text.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_WEB_EMAIL_ADDRESS_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is email address in web text.
      static int PATTERN_TEXT_WEB_PASSWORD_TYPE
      Indicates that the type of PATTERN_TEXT is password in web text.
      static int PATTERN_TYPE_MASK
      Indicates a bit mask for the keyboard type.

      • ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORCE_LINEFEED

        public static final int ENTER_KEY_FLAG_FORCE_LINEFEED
        Indicates a flag of input method option, which means that the Enter button inserts a line break when multiple lines of text are involved. If this option is not set, the Enter button performs what the action button does.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
